nodes.text: The sum of forces gathered by Beast-Lord Modon Kira, for the final civil battle against the dark side citizens of Iziz, was known as the Beast Rider army. By gathering all the Beast-Lords of all the wilderness of Onderon, Kira ammased the largest force of Beast Riders ever seen, and in 4000 BBY, with the assistance of the Jedi Knights, laid siege to Iziz.
